name: Duck Creek Technologies
overview: Duck Creek Technologies, Inc. develops and markets software for the insurance carriers to define, develop, deploy, and manage their insurance products and services. It offers EXAMPLE Platform, which enables insurance carriers to transform their products into Web-enabled insurance services, such as rating, underwriting, and policy processing; EXAMPLE Author, which defines various features of an insurance product definition, including rates, rules, algorithms, documentation, screen flow, and policy transactions; EXAMPLE ManuScripts, the XML documents that preserve the intelligence of the product definitions created with EXAMPLE Author; and EXAMPLE Server that transforms ManuScripts into Web-enabled services, such as rating, underwriting, and policy processing. The company also provides EXAMPLE Express that Web-enables various products defined by EXAMPLE Author; EXAMPLE Templates, which are customizable, off-the-shelf and NCCI-based products that provide rating, rules, stat codes, and forms support for insurance products; EXAMPLE TransACT that extends EXAMPLE Express to support policy administration; and EXAMPLE Forms, which extends the EXAMPLE Platform to support rule-based form definition, run-time form generation, and various printing and routing options. In addition, Duck Creek Technologies offers customer and integration support, manuscript customization, and training services. It provides solutions to manage portfolio of insurance products, such as product definition, commercial lines products, product delivery and processing, Web front-end, policy administration, quoting, binding and issuance, and rating services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bolivar, Missouri with additional offices in Farmington, Connecticut; and Columbia, South Carolina.
